name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdSweep - Remove Ads on X (formerly Twitter)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf X with zero ads. Add a touch of fun to your timeline by replacing ads with entertaining random gifs or chose to leave blank.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your X experience with AdSweep! This lightweight extension adds a touch of fun to your timeline by replacing traditional ads with entertaining random gifs. Customize your browsing experience by disabling the extension anytime to revert to the original content. Enjoy a lighthearted X journey without compromising your privacy. Upgrade your feed with AdSweep today!
